nodes.text: Draay 2 was a moon purchased by Lucien Draay should he have had to reconstitute a True Covenant from his mother Krynda Draay's Jedi Covenant. Many Jedi lived on the moon by 3963 BBY.

During the Clone Wars, Master B'ink Utrila and her Padawan Rennax Omani were sent on the moon with a squad of Clone troopers in order to find the Gauntlet of Kressh the Younger hidden in an abandoned temple constructed by the True Covenant and to prevent Count Dooku from recovering it.
